description.value:
1. Duty to the Throne: +3 Willpower. -10 to Interaction Skills when dealing with sources outside of the Imperium. Gain Armour of Contempt Talent if you have 40+ Willpower.
2. Duty to Humanity: +3 Perception or +3 Intelligence. -1 to starting Profit Factor.
3. Duty to your Dynasty: -3 Toughness. Gain Rival (Another Rogue Trader Family). +1 to starting Profit Factor.

requirements.text: Origin Path: Lure of the Void
